subject: MIMS
title: Advanced Film Analysis
info: application of textual analysis to the reading of a film. students work collaboratively to discern and interpret all component aural/visual elements of what the film says and how it says it.

subject: MIMS
title: Topics in Moving Image Studies
info: special topics in moving image studies.

subject: MIMS
title: Theories of the Moving Image
info: study of the moving image as the intersection between critical media studies and film studies. not a historical overview, but rather current discussions in these areas contextualized with relevant readings in classical film and media theory.

subject: MIMS
title: Historiography of Moving Image
info: genealogies of the moving image. \"crisis\" of film in debates about \"old\" and \"new\" media; hollywood's role in defining commercial and oppositional forms of moving images; approaches to the writing of history in relation to media historiography.
